promptTexts.text: Check the users eligibility against the following criteria: the minimum age is 18 and the maximum age is 75. The weight must be at least 50 kg. The user should not have heart conditions or be low in iron. Pregnant women or women who have recently given birth are ineligible to donate. They can donate as soon as 9 months after giving birth. The user is $age years old and weighs $weight Kg. Extract information about heart condition, level of iron, and any pregnancy from $conversation. Be polite and craft an email to explain to the user if they're eligible to donate and if not why.
